cellar.name: Cellar
cellar.text: +1 Action. Discard any number of cards, then draw that many.

chapel.name: Chapel
chapel.text: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand

moat.name: Moat
moat.text: +2 card. When another player plays an Attack card, you may first reveal this from your hand, to be unaffected by it

harbinger.name: Harbinger
harbinger.text: +1 Card. +1 Action. Look through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck

merchant.name: Merchant
merchant.text: +1 Card. +1 Action. The first time you play a Silver this turn, +1$

vassal.name: Vassal
vassal.text: Discard the top card of your deck. If it's an Action card, you may play it

workshop.name: Workshop
workshop.text: Gain a card costing up to $4.

bureaucrat.name: Bureaucrat
bureaucrat.text: Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

gardens.name: Gardens
gardens.text: Worth 1 Victory for every 10 card in your deck (rounded down)

militia.name: Militia
militia.text: +$2. Each other player dicsrds down to 3 cards in their hand.

moneylender.name: Moneylender
moneylender.text: You may trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +$3.

poacher.name: Poacher
poacher.text: +1 Card. +1 Action. +$1. Discard a card per empty Supply pile.

remodel.name: Remodel
remodel.text: Trash a card from your hand. Gains a card costing up to $2 more than the trashed card.

throneroom.name: Throne Room
throneroom.text: You may plan an Action card from your hand twice.

bandit.name: Bandit
bandit.text: Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top two cards of their deck, trashes a revealed Trasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.

councilroom.name: Council Room
councilroom.text: +4 Cards. +1 Buy. Each other player draws a card.

mine.name: Mine
mine.text: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Gain a Treasure to your hand costing up to $3 more than it.

sentry.name: Sentry
sentry.text: +1 Card. +1 Action. Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Trash and/or discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

witch.name: Library
witch.text: +2 Cards. Each other player gains a Curse card.

artisan.name: Artisan
artisan.text: Gain a card to your hand costing up to $5. Put a card from your hand onto your deck.
